thread.title: NFL Stars Participate in Special Pro Bowl Parade at Walt Disney World Resort
thread.title_full: NFL Stars Participate in Special Pro Bowl Parade at Walt Disney World Resort

author: Darrell Fry
title: NFL Stars Participate in Special Pro Bowl Parade at Walt Disney World Resort
text:
The atmosphere was electric at Magic Kingdom Park today as five NFL players made their way down Main Street, U.S.A. during a special Pro Bowl parade. Denver Broncos receivers Demaryius Thomas and Emmanuel Sanders, Carolina Panthers tight end Greg Olsen, Pittsburgh Steelers linebacker Ryan Shazier and Tennessee Titans tight end Delanie Walker joined Mickey Mouse , NFL cheerleaders and more. 

Confetti rained down on the players, cheering park guests lined the iconic street and red, white and blue balloons added a special welcome to these football heroes who are just days away from the 2017 Pro Bowl right here in Orlando! 

After the parade, Greg Olsen enjoyed some time in the parks with his family, creating even more memories that will last a lifetime. 
Today’s parade was just one of the many events happening throughout Walt Disney World Resort and Central Florida as part of the NFL Pro Bowl’s celebration of football at all levels.

If you haven’t had a chance to get involved in the fun, there are still plenty of opportunities, including a 5K at Epcot , the Pro Bowl Experience and team practices at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and the Pro Bowl Bash at Disney Springs . Visit espnwwos.com for more details, and to purchase tickets for the NFL Pro Bowl game on Sunday, visit www.nfl.com/probowl .
